Package callgraph

Class Summary
CallGraph A reusable class for generating a call graph based on JGraph.
CallGraphConfig The configuration for drawing a call graph, including the size, the position and the color of each procedure node and call site node.
 

Exception Summary
SourceNotFoundException An exception indicating that when adding a new edge to the call graph, the referenced source call site does not exist.
TargetNotFoundException An exception indicating that when adding a new edge to the call graph, the referenced target procedure does not exist.
